metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5043 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER.  ConsultIDs: none.  Reason: This candidate was withdrawn by its CNA.  Further investigation showed that it was not a security issue.  Notes: none.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5043` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8b+dfsg-8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.8b+dfsg-8').
